Talonflame (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0662: Fletchinder
Pokémon
#0664: Scatterbug →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Talonflame (TCG Pocket).

Talonflame has been featured on 13 different cards since it debuted in the XY expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Talonflame cards are normally Fire-type or Colorless-type Stage 2 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Talonflame

Talonflame
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #

Talonflame Guardians Rising 111/145 Alolan Moonlight 046/050
Talonflame Unified Minds 32/236 Sky Legend 013/054

Talonflame Evolving Skies 140/203 Jet-Black Spirit 057/070
        Start Deck 100   355/414

Talonflame Paldea Evolved 030/193 Clay Burst 013/071
        Generations Start Deck Xerneas ex & Noivern ex   024/175
Talonflame Stellar Crown 123/142 Stellar Miracle 085/102
